mapper.sql: id, dwm, zs_bh, fzdate_start, fzdate_end, ZZCONTENT
mapper.insert:
insert into en_qualifications
id,
dwm,
zs_bh,
fzdate_start,
fzdate_end,
ZZCONTENT,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zsBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fzdateStart,jdbcType=DATE},
#{fzdateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
#{zzcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update en_qualifications
zs_bh = #{zsBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fzdate_start = #{fzdateStart,jdbcType=DATE},
fzdate_end = #{fzdateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
ZZCONTENT = #{zzcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update en_qualifications set dwm = #{dwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zs_bh = #{zsBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fzdate_start = #{fzdateStart,jdbcType=DATE}, fzdate_end = #{fzdateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, ZZCONTENT = #{zzcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM en_qualifications t where t.dwm = #{dwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
SELECT * FROM en_qualifications t where t.dwid = #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

SELECT * from en_qualifications t
and t.dwm like concat('%',#{mhdwm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.zs_bh like concat('%',#{zsBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.zzcontent like concat('%',#{zzcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dwm in (select name from enterprise where area_name=#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
